name: LUCIA
description: LUCIA is a private AI assistant that integrates seamlessly with all your social accounts, such as Twitter, Telegram, Discord, email, and more. Based on this integration, provides extremely personalized and highly applicable information. LUCIA is a base model that leverages unhackable and privacy-centric compute and storage solutions to ensure data security. This makes it an ideal solution for Dapps, allowing them to utilize LUCIAâ€™s white-label offering and build on top of it.
